Package com.csse3200.game.components.tasks

package com.csse3200.game.components.tasks
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.csse3200.game.components
     
  • Class
    Description
    AOEAttackTask
    Task for an NPC to perform an Area of Effect (AOE) attack with a preparation phase (charge-up animation).
    BulletStormTask
    Task for the boss to perform a Bullet Storm: - Move to the center of the room at (7,5).
    ChargeTask
    Task for an entity to charge towards a target entity.
    ChaseTask
    Chases a target entity until it gets too far away or the line of sight is lost.
    FollowTask
    Chases a target entity until it gets too far away or the line of sight is lost.
    JumpTask
    Task for an NPC to "jump" towards a target, bypassing obstacles and simulating a jump arc in the y direction.
    MovementTask
    Moves the entity to a given position, finishing when it gets close enough.
    RangeAttackTask
    Task for an NPC to perform a given number of range attacks on a target entity.
    RunAwayTask
    Task for an NPC to run away from a target at a given speed.
    StraightWanderTask
    Wander around by moving in a random direction.
    TaskType
     
    WaitTask
    Task that does nothing other than waiting for a given time.
    WanderTask
    Wander around by moving to a random position within a specified range from the starting position.
